name: BurstIQ
description: This Test Connection validates the access against BurstIQ LifeGraph and basic metadata extraction of dictionaries.

steps.name: CheckAccess
steps.description: Validate that we can properly authenticate with BurstIQ using the provided credentials.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to authenticate with BurstIQ. Please validate the username, password, and realm name are correct.

steps.name: GetDictionaries
steps.description: Validate that we can fetch dictionaries (tables) from BurstIQ LifeGraph API.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch dictionaries from BurstIQ LifeGraph. Please validate that the user has sufficient privileges to read metadata.

steps.name: GetEdges
steps.description: List all the Edges available to the user in the BurstIQ LifeGraph platform for lineage extraction.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch Edges. Lineage extraction may not be available but basic metadata ingestion will still work.
